siteMetadata.name: Satya Deva Ankey
siteMetadata.title: Satya Deva | Software Developer
siteMetadata.description:
I am a Computer Science graduate student at Northeastern university, Boston. I am currently looking for opportunities
    as a software developer
siteMetadata.about:
Satya Deva is a graduate student currently pursuing his master's in computer science at 
    Northeastern University. He has 2 years of work experience in Deloitte as a software engineer 
    and is well acquainted with Java, SQL, Spring Boot, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React and Angular. 
    His primary strengths include Data Structures & Algorithms.
siteMetadata.author: satyadeva97/

projects.name: Hunt the Wumpus
projects.description:
●	Created a GUI-based adventure game using Java Swing and MVC design pattern using Kruskal’s algorithm
●	Implemented perfect mazes, room and wrapping mazes using graph data structures in Java and tested using Junit

projects.name: HireMe, Job Search Portal | group project
projects.description:
●	Designed responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS and Bootstrap elements for Single Page Applications in React
●	Create RESTful services in Spring Boot using GitHub Jobs API for fetching available jobs based on filters

projects.name: Whiteboard, course management system
projects.description:
Developed an online course management portal for centralized content sharing between faculty and students
●	Leveraged web technologies like React.js, Redux, Angular, Express.js, Node.js, Spring Boot, MySQL and MongoDB
●	Improved the student experience for process like course enrollment, accessing content and solving online quizzes

projects.name: Contact Tracing |group project
projects.description:
●	Built a contact tracing database for epidemiological research and visualization; created conceptual model in UML and logical data model expressed as ERD depicting relationships and constraints
●	Defined relational schema normalized up to BCNF and implemented the database in MySQL server

experience.name: Amazon | Incoming Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: I will be working as a software Engineer intern during the summer21 in Amazon, Boston

experience.name: Deloitte | Software Engineer | August 2018 - September 2020
experience.description:
Worked on building a web application using Java, Spring Boot and MySQL
• Enhanced the readability and performance of existing program using lambdas and hashing techniques
• Improved the performance of existing SQL queries by 50% using indexes and common table expressions
• Handled defects using HP ALM and interacted with system analysts from multiple locations for production fixes
• Participated in company hiring process by conducting technical interviews and assessments
• Trained and groomed campus hires on technologies like Java, SQL and application of data structures

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Angular, React, JSON, XML

skills.name: Tools & Technologies
skills.description: IntelliJ, Eclipse IDE, Maven, Git, HP ALM, Postman, JUnit
